attributes.description: This dashboard shows Incidents logs collected by the Palo Alto Cortex XDR integration.

params.markdown:
**Navigation**

**Palo Alto Cortex XDR**

- [Alerts](#/dashboard/panw_cortex_xdr-a349f1e6-6762-4a54-9512-e22b32acb9d9)
- **Incidents**
- [Events](#/dashboard/panw_cortex_xdr-acba7c6a-e721-46ea-9263-1d0d8cc61922)

**Overview**

This dashboard presents a focused view of incident trends and patterns, enabling efficient incident response and investigation. It includes key visualizations such as Incidents by Severity over Time, Total Incidents, Total Starred Incidents, Incidents by Status, Incidents by Alert Category, Top 10 Users with Highest Incidents, Top 10 MITRE Tactics with Highest Incidents, Top 10 MITRE Techniques with Highest Incidents, and Incidents Essential Details for in-depth analysis.

[**Integrations Page**](/app/integrations/detail/panw_cortex_xdr-2.2.0/overview)
